verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Hew <WH6458> thee two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first: <WH7223> and I will write <WH3789> upon <WH5921> these tables <WH3871> <WH853> the words <WH1697> that <WH834> were <WH1961> in <WH5921> the first <WH7223> tables, <WH3871> which <WH834> thou didst break. <WH7665>

And be <WH1961> ready <WH3559> in the morning, <WH1242> and come up <WH5927> in the morning <WH1242> unto <WH413> mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> and present thyself <WH5324> there <WH8033> to me in <WH5921> the top <WH7218> of the mount. <WH2022>

And no <WH3808> man <WH376> shall come up <WH5927> with <WH5973> thee, neither <WH408> <WH1571> let any man <WH376> be seen <WH7200> throughout all <WH3605> the mount; <WH2022> neither <WH408> <WH1571> let the flocks <WH6629> nor herds <WH1241> feed <WH7462> before <WH413> <WH4136> that <WH1931> mount. <WH2022>

And he hewed <WH6458> two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first; <WH7223> and Moses <WH4872> rose up early <WH7925> in the morning, <WH1242> and went up <WH5927> unto <WH413> mount <WH2022> Sinai, <WH5514> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had commanded <WH6680> him, and took <WH3947> in his hand <WH3027> the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone. <WH68>
And the LORD <WH3068> descended <WH3381> in the cloud, <WH6051> and stood <WH3320> with <WH5973> him there, <WH8033> and proclaimed <WH7121> the name <WH8034> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And the LORD <WH3068> passed by <WH5674> before <WH5921> <WH6440> him, and proclaimed, <WH7121> The LORD, <WH3068> The LORD <WH3068> God, <WH410> merciful <WH7349> and gracious, <WH2587> longsuffering, <WH750> <WH639> and abundant <WH7227> in goodness <WH2617> and truth, <WH571>

Keeping <WH5341> mercy <WH2617> for thousands, <WH505> forgiving <WH5375> iniquity <WH5771> and transgression <WH6588> and sin, <WH2403> and that will by no means clear <WH3808> <WH5352> <WH5352> the guilty; visiting <WH6485> the iniquity <WH5771> of the fathers <WH1> upon <WH5921> the children, <WH1121> and upon <WH5921> the children's <WH1121> children, <WH1121> unto <WH5921> the third <WH8029> and to <WH5921> the fourth <WH7256> generation.
And Moses <WH4872> made haste, <WH4116> and bowed his head <WH6915> toward the earth, <WH776> and worshiped. <WH7812>

And he said, <WH559> If <WH518> now <WH4994> I have found <WH4672> grace <WH2580> in thy sight, <WH5869> O Lord, <WH136> let my Lord, <WH136> I pray thee, <WH4994> go <WH1980> among <WH7130> us; for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is a stiffnecked <WH7186> <WH6203> people; <WH5971> and pardon <WH5545> our iniquity <WH5771> and our sin, <WH2403> and take us for thine inheritance. <WH5157>

And he said, <WH559> Behold, <WH2009> I <WH595> make <WH3772> a covenant: <WH1285> before <WH5048> all <WH3605> thy people <WH5971> I will do <WH6213> marvels, <WH6381> such as <WH834> have not <WH3808> been done <WH1254> in all <WH3605> the earth, <WH776> nor in any <WH3605> nation: <WH1471> and all <WH3605> the people <WH5971> among <WH7130> which <WH834> thou <WH859> art shall see <WH7200> <WH853> the work <WH4639> of the LORD: <WH3068> for <WH3588> it <WH1931> is a terrible thing <WH3372> that <WH834> I <WH589> will do <WH6213> with <WH5973> thee.

Observe <WH8104> thou <WH853> that which <WH834> I <WH595> command <WH6680> thee this day: <WH3117> behold, <WH2009> I drive out <WH1644> before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee <WH853> the Amorite, <WH567> and the Canaanite, <WH3669> and the Hittite, <WH2850> and the Perizzite, <WH6522> and the Hivite, <WH2340> and the Jebusite. <WH2983>

Take heed <WH8104> to thyself, lest <WH6435> thou make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land <WH776> whither <WH834> <WH5921> thou <WH859> goest, <WH935> lest <WH6435> it be <WH1961> for a snare <WH4170> in the midst <WH7130> of thee:
But <WH3588> ye shall destroy <WH5422> <WH853> their altars, <WH4196> break <WH7665> their images, <WH4676> and cut down <WH3772> their groves: <WH842>
For <WH3588> thou shalt worship <WH7812> no <WH3808> other <WH312> god: <WH410> for <WH3588> the LORD, <WH3068> whose name <WH8034> is Jealous, <WH7067> is a jealous <WH7067> God: <WH410>

Lest <WH6435> thou make <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with the inhabitants <WH3427> of the land, <WH776> and they go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods, <WH430> and do sacrifice <WH2076> unto their gods, <WH430> and one call <WH7121> thee, and thou eat <WH398> of his sacrifice; <WH4480> <WH2077>

And thou take <WH3947> of their daughters <WH4480> <WH1323> unto thy sons, <WH1121> and their daughters <WH1323> go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods, <WH430> and make <WH853> thy sons <WH1121> go a whoring <WH2181> after <WH310> their gods. <WH430>
Thou shalt make <WH6213> thee no <WH3808> molten <WH4541> gods. <WH430>

<WH853> The feast <WH2282> of unleavened bread <WH4682> shalt thou keep. <WH8104> Seven <WH7651> days <WH3117> thou shalt eat <WH398> unleavened bread, <WH4682> as <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> thee, in the time <WH4150> of the month <WH2320> Abib: <WH24> for <WH3588> in the month <WH2320> Abib <WH24> thou camest out <WH3318> from Egypt. <WH4480> <WH4714>
All <WH3605> that openeth <WH6363> the matrix <WH7358> is mine; and every <WH3605> firstling <WH6363> among thy cattle, <WH4735> whether ox <WH7794> or sheep, <WH7716> that is male. <WH2145>

But the firstling <WH6363> of an ass <WH2543> thou shalt redeem <WH6299> with a lamb: <WH7716> and if <WH518> thou redeem <WH6299> him not, <WH3808> then shalt thou break his neck. <WH6202> All <WH3605> the firstborn <WH1060> of thy sons <WH1121> thou shalt redeem. <WH6299> And none <WH3808> shall appear <WH7200> before <WH6440> me empty. <WH7387>
Six <WH8337> days <WH3117> thou shalt work, <WH5647> but on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> thou shalt rest: <WH7673> in earing time <WH2758> and in harvest <WH7105> thou shalt rest. <WH7673>

And thou shalt observe <WH6213> the feast <WH2282> of weeks, <WH7620> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of wheat <WH2406> harvest, <WH7105> and the feast <WH2282> of ingathering <WH614> at the year's <WH8141> end. <WH8622>
Thrice <WH7969> <WH6471> in the year <WH8141> shall all <WH3605> your men children <WH2138> appear <WH7200> <WH853> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH113> GOD, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel. <WH3478>

For <WH3588> I will cast out <WH3423> the nations <WH1471> before <WH4480> <WH6440> thee, and enlarge <WH7337> <WH853> thy borders: <WH1366> neither <WH3808> shall any man <WH376> desire <WH2530> <WH853> thy land, <WH776> when thou shalt go up <WH5927> to appear <WH7200> <WH853> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> thrice <WH7969> <WH6471> in the year. <WH8141>

Thou shalt not <WH3808> offer <WH7819> the blood <WH1818> of my sacrifice <WH2077> with <WH5921> leaven; <WH2557> neither <WH3808> shall the sacrifice <WH2077> of the feast <WH2282> of the passover <WH6453> be left <WH3885> unto the morning. <WH1242>

The first <WH7225> of the firstfruits <WH1061> of thy land <WH127> thou shalt bring <WH935> unto the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God. <WH430> Thou shalt not <WH3808> seethe <WH1310> a kid <WH1423> in his mother's <WH517> milk. <WH2461>

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Moses, <WH4872> Write <WH3789> thou <WH853> these <WH428> words: <WH1697> for <WH3588> after <WH5921> the tenor <WH6310> of these <WH428> words <WH1697> I have made <WH3772> a covenant <WH1285> with <WH854> thee and with <WH854> Israel. <WH3478>

And he was <WH1961> there <WH8033> with <WH5973> the LORD <WH3068> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights; <WH3915> he did neither <WH3808> eat <WH398> bread, <WH3899> nor <WH3808> drink <WH8354> water. <WH4325> And he wrote <WH3789> upon <WH5921> the tables <WH3871> <WH853> the words <WH1697> of the covenant, <WH1285> the ten <WH6235> commandments. <WH1697>

And it came to pass, <WH1961> when Moses <WH4872> came down <WH3381> from mount <WH4480> <WH2022> Sinai <WH5514> with the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of testimony <WH5715> in Moses' <WH4872> hand, <WH3027> when he came down <WH3381> from <WH4480> the mount, <WH2022> that Moses <WH4872> knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> the skin <WH5785> of his face <WH6440> shone <WH7160> while he talked <WH1696> with <WH854> him.

And when Aaron <WH175> and all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH853> Moses, <WH4872> behold, <WH2009> the skin <WH5785> of his face <WH6440> shone; <WH7160> and they were afraid <WH3372> to come nigh <WH4480> <WH5066> <WH413> him.

And Moses <WH4872> called <WH7121> unto <WH413> them; and Aaron <WH175> and all <WH3605> the rulers <WH5387> of the congregation <WH5712> returned <WH7725> unto <WH413> him: and Moses <WH4872> talked <WH1696> with <WH413> them.

And afterward <WH310> <WH3651> all <WH3605> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> came nigh: <WH5066> and he gave them in commandment <WH6680> <WH853> all <WH3605> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> had spoken <WH1696> with <WH854> him in mount <WH2022> Sinai. <WH5514>
And till Moses <WH4872> had done <WH3615> speaking <WH4480> <WH1696> with <WH854> them, he put <WH5414> a veil <WH4533> on <WH5921> his face. <WH6440>

But when Moses <WH4872> went in <WH935> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068> to speak <WH1696> with <WH854> him, he took the veil off, <WH5493> <WH853> <WH4533> until <WH5704> he came out. <WH3318> And he came out, <WH3318> and spoke <WH1696> unto <WH413> the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> <WH853> that which <WH834> he was commanded. <WH6680>

And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> saw <WH7200> <WH853> the face <WH6440> of Moses, <WH4872> that <WH3588> the skin <WH5785> of Moses' <WH4872> face <WH6440> shone: <WH7160> and Moses <WH4872> put <WH7725> <WH853> the veil <WH4533> upon <WH5921> his face <WH6440> again, until <WH5704> he went in <WH935> to speak <WH1696> with <WH854> him.
